actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize reimbursement of the Federal share of the cost of construction of a toll bridge across the Ohio River at or in the vicinity of Huntington, West Virginia.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to reimburse the Federal share of the cost of construction of a new toll bridge across the Ohio River at Huntington, West Virginia, in accordance with a specified formula. Designates such bridge to be a part of the Federal-aid primary system.

titles.title: A bill to authorize reimbursement of the Federal share of the cost of construction of a toll bridge across the Ohio River at or in the vicinity of Huntington, West Virginia.
